Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
20.02.2013 JH SCR17961 Changed permission hndling for SCF debtors
01.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CLHS)
14.08.2012 SH SCR17511 Changed font 129 to 211 for control to display the remarks
20.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
28.04.2011 SH SCR16430 Replaced GB002 by GB902
27.12.2010 GB SCR16091 SCR Added second call of BMQ005
21.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
15.06.2010 GB SCR15584 Added check permission For SCF
05.01.2009 SH SCR14121 Button OK: Moved module to store MQ202 to part if
the entered limit is OK
20.11.2008 SH SCR14121 Button OK: Disable storage of MQ202 if user has no
30.09.2008 SH SCR13963 Changes in call of BMQ001 for MQ202
03.09.2008 SH SCR13911 Changed screen to 1024*768 and added button Not OK and
moved button OK database updates to OMQ198U
07.08.2008 SH SCR13863 Added missing test on CLHS_WAITFORAPPROVAL = N to
call BDC126
16.07.2008 SH SCR13797 Added new step 5 "Update CLCR"
16.05.2008 SH SCR13616 Enlarged control to show CLHS_TEXT
11.03.2008 SH SCR13462 Added BDC128NL.PO.MAXUSERLIMIT (not used in this program)
22.11.2007 SH SCR13158 Added BDC126.PI.CLHS_TEXT = null
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Reset ouptput parameters
-- Button Debtor
... check if possible to return to online screen, maybe CLHS row is already
deleted in ODC001BNL
-- Button Not OK
-- Button OK
... Sort descending to fetch LDHI with highest date/time
-- Validations (only if button OK is pressed)
... CLHS_TEXT must be entered
-- CLHS_TEXT changes are stored outside OMQ198U transaction (should be OK)
... obtain limit competence of the user
... no authorization
... approval not allowed, limit competence exceeded
Not allowed to approve finance limit for SCF supplier if there are no bank...
No permission for SCF debtors
... approval allowed, so perform DB updates (inside a single transaction)
... inform the user who entered the request
... give message that 1 other approval is required
... Sort descending to fetch LDHI with highest date/time

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Finance limit approved with remarks by')&' '&Trim ({0,3})
MlsTrans ('Finance limit approved without remarks by')&' '&Trim ({0,3})
